alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hernando; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 1:17PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Sumter, Pasco, Hernando, northwestern Polk and northeastern Hillsborough Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 116 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Zephyrhills West, or near Zephyrhills, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, Lakeland, Plant City, Auburndale, Zephyrhills, Brooksville, Dade City, Bushnell, Lutz, St. Leo, Weeki Wachee, Hillsborough River State Park, South Brooksville, Zephyrhills South, North Brooksville, Zephyrhills West, Land O Lakes, Hernando County Airport and Wesley Chapel South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hernando; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter
